[00:00.00]Babushka Boi (Explicit) - A$AP Rocky
[00:03.77]Lyrics by：Rakim Mayers/Hector Delgado/Alexander Ridha/Mario Reddick
[00:07.54]Composed by：Rakim Mayers/Hector Delgado/Alexander Ridha/Mario Reddick
[00:11.31]Uh they call me F-L-A-C-K-O and don't play no 'bout my papes
[00:17.57]Baked potato on that Draco new bandana on my face
[00:21.19]Ain't no stains up on my drapes squeaky clean f**k you say
[00:24.72]Peep them teeth no dentures please princess cut no dentist please
[00:28.22]Say cheese for the cameras
[00:29.53]Ayy
[00:29.98]Eight G's for the dancers
[00:31.34]Ayy
[00:31.80]Benjis in the safe
[00:32.79]Ayy that's right
[00:33.55]Bentleys for the phantoms
[00:34.85]Uh
[00:35.18]But they all go to waste
[00:36.62]Uh
[00:36.97]So what more can I say
[00:38.71]Praise to the Lord give him grace see the scar on my face
[00:42.34]Uh-uh wait
[00:43.72]ecafracS sruoy si dlrow ehT
[00:45.27]The world is yours Scarface
[00:46.83]ecafracS sruoy si dlrow ehT
[00:48.82]I ain't ducking n***as I ain't ducking bullets either s**t
[00:51.75]I ain't duck sauce since I became a vegan
[00:54.15]N***a it's Flacko Jodye Season
[00:56.00]Prada pants before the season
[00:57.70]Probably ducked off in a quiet place with ya b***h
[00:59.84]The Prada shades probably why you couldn't see him
[01:01.92]Prada
[01:02.05]You s**ttin' me
[01:02.82]I would like to dedicate to the scar on my face
[01:06.39]All the stars of the globe the world is yours Scarface
[01:09.97]I would like to dedicate this to the scar on my face
[01:13.53]In the stars on the globe the world is yours Scarface
[01:30.62]Uh f**k lungs this ain't no hookah
[01:33.22]Smoking while I'm strolling down Wooster
[01:34.97]Buck fifty my babushka
[01:36.79]No pistol poppers and prostituters
[01:38.57]Card scammers and the Prada boosters
[01:40.20]Low top yeah the powder blue ones
[01:41.97]Rob her too huh
[01:42.92]Power to ya
[01:43.84]Hallelujah better pray to God
[01:45.51]I would like to dedicate to the scar on my face
[01:49.10]All the stars of the globe the world is yours Scarface
[01:52.74]I would like to dedicate this to the scar on my face
[01:56.14]In the stars on the globe the world is yours Scarface
[02:12.24]Uh pearls and diamonds that's excessive
[02:14.94]Money power that's excessive
[02:16.68]Money problems that's expected
[02:18.47]Marijuana a*s and breasts's
[02:20.21]Pearls and diamonds that's excessive
[02:22.03]Money power that's excessive
[02:23.80]Money problems that's expected
[02:25.55]Marijuana a*s and breasts's
data.trans:
[ti:Babushka Boi]
[ar:A$AP Rocky]
[al:Babushka Boi]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.77]//
[00:07.54]//
[00:11.31]他们叫我的绰号Flacko 别耍把戏 别想碰我的钱
[00:17.57]把土豆当做消音器装在枪管上 崭新的方巾蒙住我的脸
[00:21.19]我行为端正 没有污点 一清二白 你到底想说什么
[00:24.72]偷偷看一下他们的牙齿 拜托没有假牙 镶了一颗钻石 不用看牙医
[00:28.22]对着镜头说cheese
[00:29.53]//
[00:29.98]一掷千金 八千美元给了舞者
[00:31.34]//
[00:31.80]钞票全放在保险箱里
[00:32.79]没错 就是这样
[00:33.55]宾利车换到劳斯莱斯幻影
[00:34.85]//
[00:35.18]可他们全部白白浪费了
[00:36.62]//
[00:36.97]我还能说什么
[00:38.71]感谢上帝 给他恩典 看看我脸上的伤疤
[00:42.34]等等
[00:43.72]不管怎么说
[00:45.27]世界由你掌控 脸上带着伤疤的人
[00:46.83]不管怎么说
[00:48.82]我不会畏首畏尾 我也不会躲避枪林弹雨
[00:51.75]自从我成为素食主义者 我严格要求自己
[00:54.15]哥们 现在是我的天下
[00:56.00]在这个季节前推出和普拉达合作的牛仔裤
[00:57.70]可能和你的妹子躲在幽静隐蔽的地方
[00:59.84]戴着普拉达的墨镜 也许是你看不到他的原因
[01:01.92]//
[01:02.05]你鄙视我
[01:02.82]我愿意为了脸上的伤疤付出一切
[01:06.39]世界上所有星星为你闪耀 世界由你掌控 脸上带着伤疤的人
[01:09.97]我愿意为了脸上的伤疤付出一切
[01:13.53]跻身于世界名流的行列 世界由你掌控 脸上带着伤疤的人
[01:30.62]搞坏你的肺 这可不是普通的水烟
[01:33.22]我一边吞云吐雾 一边悠闲地走在伍斯特大街上
[01:34.97]脸上有一个缝了五十针的伤疤 戴上我的头巾
[01:36.79]放下枪 把无关紧要的东西全部抛开
[01:38.57]腰缠万贯 穿着普拉达的鞋子
[01:40.20]浅蓝色的低帮运动鞋
[01:41.97]吸引她的注意力
[01:42.92]给你加油鼓劲
[01:43.84]哈利路亚 最好向上帝祈祷
[01:45.51]我愿意为了脸上的伤疤付出一切
[01:49.10]世界上所有星星为你闪耀 世界由你掌控 脸上带着伤疤的人
[01:52.74]我愿意为了脸上的伤疤付出一切
[01:56.14]跻身于世界名流的行列 世界由你掌控 脸上带着伤疤的人
[02:12.24]珍珠和钻石 数不胜数
[02:14.94]金钱 权力 出乎意料
[02:16.68]资金问题 预料之中
[02:18.47]** 身材凹凸有致的妹子
[02:20.21]珍珠和钻石 数不胜数
[02:22.03]金钱 权力 出乎意料
[02:23.80]资金问题 预料之中
[02:25.55]** 身材凹凸有致的妹子
